bibl.title: The Egyptian Billon Tetradrachm under the Julio-Claudian Emperors - Fiduciary or Intrinsic?
bibl.note: Analysis of 26 billon tetradrachms of Alexandria. - Introduction. - Part I: Analyses of Alexandrian and Tyrian silver. - Part II: Alexandria, Tyr, Antioch, and Rome. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Butcher Kevin and Matthew Ponting, The Egyptian Billon Tetradrachm under the Julio-Claudian Emperors - Fiduciary or Intrinsic?
SNR 84 (2005) pp. 93-124, nombr. tabl. et graph.
Analysis of 26 billon tetradrachms of Alexandria. - Introduction. - Part I: Analyses of Alexandrian and Tyrian silver. - Part II: Alexandria, Tyr, Antioch, and Rome. - Conclusions.
